text: The Ballad of Cossack Golota () is a 1937 Soviet action drama movie directed by Igor Savchenko.Дума про казака ГолотуДУМА ПРО КАЗАКА ГОЛОТУ It stars Konstantin Nassonov, Leonid Shekhtman, and Konstantin Tyrtov. == Actors == * Konstantin Nassonov as Commissar * Leonid Shekhtman as Zhigan * Konstantin Tyrtov as Sashko * Nina Rusinova as Mother * Nikolai Sokolov as Grandfather == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s action movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian action movies Category:Movies directed by Igor Savchenko
title: The Ballad of Cossack Golota
